user_query: I'm planning a surprise birthday party for my best friend who is a basketball enthusiast. Can you suggest some NBA player-themed decorations and party games for the event? Additionally, fetch me some interesting NBA player statistics and jokes to entertain the guests.

TaskList.description: Research and compile a list of NBA player-themed decorations suitable for a birthday party.
Suggest fun party games that revolve around basketball and NBA players.
Fetch interesting statistics about popular NBA players to share during the party.
Gather basketball-themed jokes to entertain the guests.
